sentence.Network_en: Haley studied her, an enigmatic smile on his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑利打量着她，脸上带着神秘的笑容。

sentence.Network_en: She starred in one of Welles's most enigmatic films.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在韦尔斯最具神秘色彩的一部电影中出演主角。

黄宝书3天背完GRE单词1 - 豆丁网 ... cloying：adj. 甜的发腻的 enigmatic：adj. 谜一般的,高深莫测的 cower:vi. 畏缩,退缩.

list.abs: 隐能组什么词_百度知道 ... 46. 隐忧[ secret sorry] 47. 隐语[ enigmatic language;code word] 48. 隐喻[ metaphor].
Whatever future excavations reveal about Huangdi ' s enigmatic nature , some things seem unlikely to change ., 无论未来的发掘会揭露秦始皇怎样神秘的本质 , 有些事情看上去是不会有什么改变的.
foreigner consider japan to be an enigmatic country ., 外国人认为日本是一个不可思议的国家.
Since then he has been an enigmatic figure at the field of architecture ., 从此以后 , 他在建筑界一直是一个谜一样的人物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French énigmatique or late Latin aenigmaticus, based on Greek ainigma 'riddle' (see enigma)

entry.tran: 神秘的;谜一般的;费解的
entry.def: Someone or something that is enigmatic is mysterious and difficult to understand.

example.ex: Haley studied her, an enigmatic smile on his face...
example.tran: 黑利打量着她，脸上带着神秘的笑容。

example.ex: She starred in one of Welles's most enigmatic films.
example.tran: 她在韦尔斯最具神秘色彩的一部电影中出演主角。

sentences.sentence: "I didn't grasp the meaning of that enigmatic comment until much later"
"prophetic texts so enigmatic that their meaning has been disputed for centuries"

means.word_mean: 2. resembling an oracle in obscurity of thought;

sentences.sentence: "so enigmatic that priests might have to clarify it"

auth_sentence.content: His pet style blends the epigrammatic with the enigmatic.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His pet style blends the epigrammatic with the enigmatic.

auth_sentence.content: As enigmatic as the face of Mona Lisa.
auth_sentence.res_content: As enigmatic as the face of Mona Lisa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: As enigmatic as the face of Mona Lisa.

auth_sentence.content: They overran Harrods and one enigmatic adventurer took Chelsea singlehandedly.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或科学"; 2. 表形容词,通常放在名词后,表示"与……相关的,……的"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 浪漫的,传奇式的;不切实际的,好幻想的
stems_affixes.word_buile: roman浪漫+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.浪漫的,传奇式的;不切实际的,好幻想的
a无,缺乏+pathe=path感情+tic与……相关的,……的→无动于衷的
aroma芳香+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.芳香的
chao混乱+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.混乱的
charisma超凡魅力,感召力+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.有魅力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 戏剧的,戏剧性的;剧烈的
stems_affixes.word_buile: drama戏剧+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.戏剧的,戏剧性的;剧烈的
enigma谜+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.神秘的,难解的
gene因子,基因+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.遗传[学]的 n.[-s]遗传学
schema=scheme图解,摘要+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.扼要的,图解的
psych心理[的]+o+tic人或科学→adj.&n.精神病的,疯子
lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等
gene因子,基因+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.遗传[学]的 n.[-s]遗传学
